name: Passenger 56: Tales from The BUSAVERSE
description:
Why just watch the bus, when you can ride it...

The Dream: 64 players on a bus!

The Reality: A nifty intro sequence & a hidden test scene that joins a 64 player lobby.

#JamLife

Check out this video of the intro: https://twitter.com/RancidBacon/status/1461658244976287752
